predictions.text: The market index will see a boost following positive developments in trade negotiations between major global economies within the next three months, with a confidence of 70%.
Tech stocks will outperform traditional industries after the release of groundbreaking advancements in artificial intelligence technology, with a confidence of 80%.
The price of gold will experience a steady increase over the next six months as geopolitical tensions escalate in key regions, with a confidence of 85%.
The demand for renewable energy stocks will surge following new government incentives aimed at combating climate change, with a confidence of 75%.
The housing market will face a downturn due to rising interest rates and inflation concerns in the next year, with a confidence of 60%.
